title: New Collection Action RESHARD
description:
This would redistribute the replicas among other nodes so that the no:of replicas in each node is  more or less same

This command would identify the new set of ranges as if the collection is being created today with these many shards. Once the ranges are identified, A sequence of SPLITSHARD and MERGESHARD commands are issued

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
I suggest we name it something else . When I saw this JIRA I immediately thought it would make new shards or something.
